title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7001.5 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7001.5 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted and
records produced upon reasonable notice during all hours regularly open for
business. These hours are 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday through Friday, except for
times when the office may be closed or visitor access may be restricted, such
as due to legal holidays or public health advisories, or when confidential
proceedings are being conducted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
7001.5

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 52, eff. 12/28/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
